Merciful Eating Rules 1.0


	

		
Preample

		

			
Paragon distribution of merciful grocercies is important.

			
Limiting harm is crucial.

			
Unethical actions lead to other unethical actions.

		

	

	
	

		
Sanctioned for Homo Sapiens

		

			
This can be used for the purpose of promoting, distibuting, or otherwise amplifying the growth and absorption of these:

			
			
    
				
  • "Herbs" where herbs include "algae", "plants", and "fungi"
    • 
				
  • "Cultured Meats", where cultured meats imply meat that is made from lab grown cyto-cloning.
    • 
				
  • Homo sapien breast milk
    • 
			

		

	

	
	

		
Sanctioned Homo Sapiens 10 or younger

		

			
This can be used for the purpose of promoting, distibuting, or otherwise amplifying the growth and absorption of these:

			
			
    
				
  • Free range (as defined by the USA) eggs
    • 
				
  • Muscles, Clams
    • 
			

		

	

	
	

		
Sanctioned for non "Homo Sapiens", such as cats, snakes, etc.

		

			
This can be used for the purpose of promoting, distibuting, or otherwise amplifying the growth and absorption of these:

			
			
    
				
  • Everything in the "Sanctioned Homo Sapien Foods" article.
    • 
			

		

	

	
	

		
Notes

		

			Carnivorousness is quite obviously a driving factor of galapagosness.  
			Ending carnivorousness is not the objective.
			The objective is protecting animals of ever species with laws that ensure their quality of life.
